resources.string: "I couldn't find an email app. You can contact us at support@stonekick.com"

"If you like %1$s, please rate it.
Thanks for your support!"

"This compass shows the direction to magnetic north.
When the screen is horizontal, the compass shows the direction towards the top of the screen. When the screen is vertical, the compass shows the direction that the back of the device is facing (i.e. the direction that your device's camera is pointing).
This app is dependent upon the accuracy of the sensors within your device. For the best results move your device away from any magnetic fields (metallic objects, electronic devices etc). Also check that you don't have a magnet on your case.
Press the menu button on your device to see more options.
This app was created by Jo and Andy at Stonekick. You can contact us at support@stonekick.com. For further information on our apps visit our website www.stonekick.com."

"Accurate Compass has been updated!
This release includes a new Korean translation, as well as a few other minor improvements.
For a full list of changes see www.stonekick.com/compass_changelog.html"

"This compass was developed by Stonekick.
You can contact us at support@stonekick.com."
Your compass needs to be calibrated - please follow the calibration instructions.
Abnormal acceleration detected. The device should be stationary to ensure an accurate reading.
Abnormal magnetic field detected. Move away from all metallic objects and electronic devices.
Abnormal magnetic field - check for nearby magnets

"Wave your device around several times in a figure of 8 pattern until the accuracy is 'high'.
If your device is very hot you may need to wait for it to cool down. You can also try switching it off and on again."

The magnetic field and accelerometer sensors in your device are of limited accuracy, even when they are well calibrated. The readings that they produce contain lots of noise, which means that the north direction that they report can vary by as much as a few degrees every second. To give a more stable (and accurate) heading, this compass applies some filtering to the sensor outputs. You can switch off this filtering to see how much of a difference it makes.

"Accurate Compass can't access your device's magnetic field sensor.
Please try turning your device off and on again."
Like Accurate Compass? Upgrade to Accurate Compass Pro to remove the adverts and support development of the app!
